articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Google reveals Pixel Fold early in new NBA ad - The Verge
articles.description: Footage of the Pixel Fold has appeared in a YouTube ad alongside star NBA players ahead of its anticipated announcement at Google I/O later today.
articles.content:
Google reveals Pixel Fold early in unlisted ad
Google reveals Pixel Fold early in unlisted ad
